subject: [perl #42354] [TODO] preserve type system in pic_inline_sub__() op
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Paul Cochrane 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42354]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue.

In the file src/ops/pic.ops in the pic_inline_sub__() op there is the todo item:

"preserve type system"

This needs to be implemented.
